title: Switching Keyboard Layouts: QWERTY to Colemak
tags: rapid skill acquistion, colebak, typing, neuroplasticity
snippet: Switching Keyboard Layouts About 10-years ago a friend of mine switched from QWERTY to the Dvorak keyboard layout. I thought it was insane. Fast forward to today and since reading The First 20 Hours by Josh Kaufman, I’m convinced to switch. I’ll be switching to the Colemak keyboard layout. A few...
